data.title: Immoral Women [Les Héroïnes du mal] (Original photograph from the 1979 film) by Walerian Borowczyk (director, screenwriter); André Pieyre de Mandiargues (screenwriter); Françoise Quéré, Marina Pierro,
data.meta_description: N.p., N.p. - 1979 - Vintage reference photograph from the 1979 film. Annotations in manuscript ink on the verso noting director Walerian Borowczyk's name and the film title in French. An anthology film divided into three segments, set in three different time periods (Rome in 1520, France at the turn of the century, and modern Paris) and following three women who are driven to commit crimes of passion. 9.25 x 7 inches. Near Fine. - Immoral Women [Les Héroïnes du mal] (Original photograph from the 1979 film)
